author: hwright
msg: Instead of storing revision->offset mappings for the pack offset cache,
just store shard->offset_array mappings.  This should reduce the amount of
space used in the cache by about half.
(get_packed_offset): Cache the entire manifest array as one blob, instead of
(manifest_serialize): ...to this, and make it work for the manifest array.
(manifest_deserialize): ... to this, and fix for the manifest array.
(dup_pack_manifest): ...to this, and duplicate an array, not a offset.
(svn_fs_fs__initialize_caches): Update function name parameters, and magic
